Audio.Locality: 10 km S Pocone on Transpantaneira, Mato Grosso
Audio.Author: Daniel Lane
Audio.Comments: Natural song at dawn from a male sitting on a child's merry-go-round, then down to ground to forage on grass seeds (while still singing). At end, a physical fight on ground between it and another male, after which this male flew off.
Audio.BackgroundSpecies: Theristicus caerulescens,Dendrocygna viduata,Campylorhynchus turdinus,Pitangus sulphuratus,Furnarius rufus,Progne tapera,Machetornis rixosa
